card.description:
by WorldTribune Staff, March 1, 2022

Police body cam video out of Salida, Colorado shows former Dominion Voting Systems executive Eric Coomer continually denying to police that he was responsible for crashing his truck into a building before finally admitting he indeed was behind the wheel.

[caption id=attachment_106843 align=alignleft width=425] Eric Coomer[/caption]

Despite being told that several witnesses had described him to a T and police saying damage to his truck matched damage to the building, Coomer continues to deny responsibility before telling the police to speak to his lawyer.

The incident occurred in September of last year but the body cam footage did not emerge on YouTube until Monday.

By the end of the body cam video, after police had spoken to the lawyer and explained that Coomer could be charged with a felony, Coomer finally comes clean and admits crashing into the building, saying he was under a lot of stress and then telling the police they could Google my name.

Police also tell the lawyer that Coomer managed to avoid a DUI by going to a local bar and having a few shots of alcohol immediately after the crash.

Joe Oltmann, the Denver businessman who received death threats after exposing Coomer for boasting about being able to rig the 2020 election against President Donald Trump, wrote in a Telegram post:

Yeah‚Ä¶ guy hits a building, lies about that he did it, three times‚Ä¶ says he panicked. But he had nothing to do with the stealing of an election, ties to Antifa and deleting all his social accounts and posts before filing a lawsuit? Nah‚Ä¶ all that is just a coincidence. My life has been turned upside down while this piece of excrement continues to wreak havoc on others. Even after we have the proof that the machines are stealing elections and proof mounts‚Ä¶ they continue to lie, more‚Ä¶ the counter suits and suits are going to be very fun.

Related: Who is Eric Coomer of Dominion Voting Systems?, November 17, 2020

Coomer was vice president of U.S. engineering for Dominion Voting Systems. According to his biography, Coomer graduated from the University of California, Berkeley with a Ph.D. in Nuclear Physics. He was later promoted to voting systems officer of strategy and security at Dominion.

Oltmann exposed Coomer as having told Antifa members: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt worry about the election, Trump‚Äôs not gonna win. I made f*cking sure of that!‚Äù

Oltmann said he was banned from Twitter after exposing Coomer.

Trump White House adviser Garrett Ziegler, whose Marco Polo research group is investigating the 2020 election and Hunter Biden. said of Coomer in a Telegram post: Full take.. this guy is a MESS! And, more importantly, he is a Bolshevik!

The Olympic Games of Paris 1924.
In athletics, the British Eric Liddell, big favorite of the 100 meters, but also Protestant, and fervent believer, refused to take part in the final organized one Sunday, day of the Lord... It is his compatriot Harold Abrahams who imposed himself in the 100 meters. However, he won the 400 meters, which was not his specialty, but whose final was held on a Thursday!
This story inspired the movie "Chariots of Fire", which won four Academy Awards in 1982.

_source.content: Sinema, Cornyn introduce bipartisan immigration bill in SenateKVOA ^ | 6/2/2021 | Eric Finkhttps://kvoa.com/news/2021/06/02/sinema-cornyn-introduce-bipartisan-immigration-bill-in-senate/It is a bipartisan effort to try and come up with a more effective immigration system.The Bipartisan Border Solutions Act introduced by Democratic Senator Kyrsten Sinema of Arizona and Republican Senator John Cornyn of Texas aims to quicken the asylum process in our country.‚Ä¶The bill outlines several key provisions to tackle the skyrocketing caseload including:improving access to legal counselimproving language translation servicesproviding resources to hire 150 more immigration judges and their teamshiring 300 more asylum officers
_source.contentraw:
Sinema, Cornyn introduce bipartisan immigration bill in Senate
KVOA ^ | 6/2/2021 | Eric Fink
https://kvoa.com/news/2021/06/02/sinema-cornyn-introduce-bipartisan-immigration-bill-in-senate/

It is a bipartisan effort to try and come up with a more effective immigration system.

The Bipartisan Border Solutions Act introduced by Democratic Senator Kyrsten Sinema of Arizona and Republican Senator John Cornyn of Texas aims to quicken the asylum process in our country.
‚Ä¶
The bill outlines several key provisions to tackle the skyrocketing caseload including:

improving access to legal counsel

improving language translation services

providing resources to hire 150 more immigration judges and their teams

hiring 300 more asylum officers

_source.content: This article shows the New Normal in NYC. But, for some reason, The View doesn't cover it.Notice how Fox News accidentally leaves out that the "individual" committing the assault is a black male, and the woman being assaulted is a white female. She mouthes "please help me" while the passengers sit by and do nothing. In the past, they'd slam this deranged individual to the floor. Now, everyone is afraid of being sued or even arrested themselves while being accused of "racism" by MSNBC.We can take heart in knowing that Eric Adams proposes that "there may be a slight decrease" in police funding, since the police are clearly the problem according to Ivy League academics and Colin Kaepernick. Also, Kathy Hochul is doing something, like freting over a tiny increase in coronavirus cases. It's comforting to know that politicians are concerned with our well-being.Excerpt:New York City Mayor Eric Adams' office did not respond to an inquiry from Fox News Digital regarding the video.Transit crime incidents in New York City have increased by nearly 58% year-over-year from 576 incidents last year, when fewer people were commuting to work via public transit due to COVID-19, to 907 this year. Total violent crime has increased by more than 39% year-over-year, according to the New York Police Department's crime statistics for the week ending May 22.Several incidents have made national headlines this year. On Tuesday, a New York City Goldman Sachs employee was killed in an unprovoked attack on a moving subway car. In April, a shooting in a crowded subway car left 29 people injured ‚Äî 10 of whom sustained gunshot wounds. In January, a 40-year-old Deloitte employee was fatally pushed in front of a moving train.https://www.foxnews.com/us/woman-harassed-nyc-subway-bystanders
_source.contentraw:
This article shows the New Normal in NYC. But, for some reason, The View doesn't cover it.

Notice how Fox News accidentally leaves out that the "individual" committing the assault is a black male, and the woman being assaulted is a white female. She mouthes "please help me" while the passengers sit by and do nothing. In the past, they'd slam this deranged individual to the floor. Now, everyone is afraid of being sued or even arrested themselves while being accused of "racism" by MSNBC.

We can take heart in knowing that Eric Adams proposes that "there may be a slight decrease" in police funding, since the police are clearly the problem according to Ivy League academics and Colin Kaepernick. Also, Kathy Hochul is doing something, like freting over a tiny increase in coronavirus cases. It's comforting to know that politicians are concerned with our well-being.

Excerpt:

New York City Mayor Eric Adams' office did not respond to an inquiry from Fox News Digital regarding the video.

Transit crime incidents in New York City have increased by nearly 58% year-over-year from 576 incidents last year, when fewer people were commuting to work via public transit due to COVID-19, to 907 this year. Total violent crime has increased by more than 39% year-over-year, according to the New York Police Department's crime statistics for the week ending May 22.

Several incidents have made national headlines this year. On Tuesday, a New York City Goldman Sachs employee was killed in an unprovoked attack on a moving subway car. In April, a shooting in a crowded subway car left 29 people injured ‚Äî 10 of whom sustained gunshot wounds. In January, a 40-year-old Deloitte employee was fatally pushed in front of a moving train.

https://www.foxnews.com/us/woman-harassed-nyc-subway-bystanders

The first sign, however, that things might not be going the globalists‚Äô way, came on Wednesday, the 25th of May, which just happened to also be Africa Day. Botswana read a statement on behalf of its 47 AFRO members, saying they would be collectively withholding their support for the ‚Äòreforms‚Äô, which many African members were very concerned about. Multiple other countries also said they had reservations over the changes and would not be supporting them either. These included Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa, Iran and Malaysia.

_source.contentraw:
Deaths of 3 women in early heat wave raise questions, fears

Temperatures barely climbed into the 90s and only for a couple of days. But the discovery of the bodies of three women inside a Chicago senior housing facility this month left the city looking for answers to questions that were supposed to be addressed after a longer and hotter heat wave killed more than 700 people nearly three decades ago.

Now, the city‚Äîand the country‚Äîis facing the reality that because of climate change, deadly heat waves can strike just about anywhere, don't only fall in the height of summer and need not last long.

"Hotter and more dangerous heat waves are coming earlier, in May ... and the other thing is we are getting older and more people are living alone," said Eric Klinenberg, a New York University sociologist, who wrote "Heat Wave: A Social Autopsy of Disaster in Chicago." about the 1995 heat wave. "It's a formula for disaster."

The Cook County Medical Examiner's office has yet to determine the causes of death for the three women whose bodies were found in the James Sneider Apartments on May 14. But the victims' families have already filed or plan to file wrongful death lawsuits against the companies that own and manage the buildings.

In the Bible, everyone who has received Jesus Christ by faith is a saint. In Roman Catholic practice, the saints are revered, prayed to, and in some instances, worshiped. In the Bible, saints are called to revere, worship, and pray to God alone.‚Äùhttps://www.gotquestions.org/saints-Christian.htmlA ‚Äúcult‚Äù is deemed so since it claims to have faith in Jesus but it fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. (Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Eric von Anderseck of the Second Eighth Week Apostles (S8W), Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen White of Seventh Day Adventism and so on.)By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus. No artificial anything‚Äù (‚ÄúTHE GOSPEL ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Forever‚Äôs a long time.There are no contradictions in The Word...EVER.Another cult example:In the Mormon ‚Äúchurch‚Äù, they pass the communion elements around but no one takes them.A ‚Äúfake Mormon‚Äù guy I know visited the week they were doing that.When the elements got to him, he LOUDLY announced to everyone that he was ‚Äúpartaking and here‚Äôs why... ‚ÄùThe service ended and a group approached him and asked him to not come back.That's actually tragic since forever‚Äôs a long time and Mormonism is as fake as any other cult out there. There are literally dozens of each, cults and false religions.____________________Sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which The Lord created that person, self included. (Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Eric von Anderseck of the Second Eighth Week Apostles (S8W), Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen White of Seventh Day Adventism and so on.)

By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus. No artificial anything‚Äù (‚ÄúTHE GOSPEL ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Someone born again (or ‚Äúborn from above‚Äù ‚Äì or ‚Äúborn anew‚Äù ‚Äì John 3:3-6 ‚Äì https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) is only qualified to teach the new covenant (study 2 Corinthians 3:4-11). Forever‚Äôs a long time.

There are no contradictions in The Word...EVER.

Another cult example:
In the Mormon ‚Äúchurch‚Äù, they pass the communion elements around but no one takes them.
A ‚Äúfake Mormon‚Äù guy I know visited the week they were doing that.
When the elements got to him, he LOUDLY announced to everyone that he was ‚Äúpartaking and here‚Äôs why... ‚Äù
The service ended and a group approached him and asked him to not come back.
That's actually tragic since forever‚Äôs a long time and Mormonism is as fake as any other cult out there. There are literally dozens of each, cults and false religions.
____________________
Sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which The Lord created that person, self included. No one is perfect and there is no one righteous...AT ALL (Isaiah 64:6, John 8:7, Romans 3:10-12, Romans 3:21-26, 1 John 1:8-10). According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them (see also Jude 1:23). EVERYONE needs a savior.

‚Äú...and the truth shall set you free‚Äù (John 8:31-32).

Brothers and Sisters in Christ, I‚Äôm @shooglenifty and my fellow administrator is @libertyordeath777. 

God is good and His mercy endures forever!
***
By posting you are agreeing to our posting standards. We will remove a post that doesn't follow the guidelines below.
***
My hopes for the group is to foster phileo between the Christian diaspora that has chosen to join this group. We want to be a place where unbelievers come for answers and believers come to be bolstered in their faith. By the grace of God through the blood of Jesus we will bring His love to multitudes. My reasoning? I believe this: "Never doubt God‚Äôs mighty power to work in you and accomplish all this. He will achieve infinitely more than your greatest request, your most unbelievable dream, and exceed your wildest imagination! He will outdo them all, for his miraculous power constantly energizes you.‚ÄùEphesians 3:20 TPT
***
PLEASE READ BEFORE POSTING:
Posts that are encouraged (think ENGAGEMENT! and WHAT IS GOD TELLING YOU!):
1. Testimonies, praise reports, prayer requests, encouragements, prophecies, words from God, exhortations, etc.
2. Questions of those looking to our community for answers that only God can give.
3. Sermons, articles, videos, pictures and verses as long as they have a good description outlining who, what, where, why and how. If you don't respect the link you are posting or the other Christians in the group enough to take some time with your post, please don't post it. 
***
It seems most just post and run (seagull posting) and this is not God's heart nor mine. This group has ONE timeline. It also has many members. Is it respectful on your part to post several one line posts in a row pushing someone else's well thought post or plea out of sight of the group? With that in mind the following types of posts will be removed at the sole discretion of the moderators:
1. Off topic posts: politics, begging for followers or money, promoting personal agendas, etc.
2. Intentionally divisive, disrespectful or racist posts
3. Low effort (Just posting a video/link is not sufficient within the group, you must also write YOUR OWN description of the link/video; the included video/link description is not acceptable) or multiple posts in a row (limit of 2 posts per 3 hours)
4. Posts that don't meet the criteria mentioned above
5. Any reposts from other groups that are unrelated to Christianity; reposts of posts already in the group timeline (if you agree with a post just say it in the original post); and any reposts of your disagreements within a post brought to the group timeline.
6. Anyone who spams the same post to multiple groups (yes, I check timelines)
7. All members who block the administrators and moderators will be removed.
***
Remember that we are the body of Christ. Please keep your posts in line with Philippians 4:8 (ESV): Finally brothers, whatever is true, whatever is honorable, whatever is just, whatever is pure, whatever is lovely, whatever is commendable, if there is any excellence, if there is anything worthy of praise, think (post!) about these things.
***
‚ÄúThe Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you; the Lord lift up his countenance upon you and give you peace. ‚ÄúSo shall they put my name upon the people of Israel, and I will bless them.‚Äù‚ÄùNumbers 6:24-27 ESV
